Halucigen stood slowly grabbing his left arm as it hug limply.  A 
worried look in his face he glanced up throguh the shield , looking 
for Shredder.  'Get me out of here' he thought.

"Huh uh- right, I just wanted to show my wares.  You know... 
umm...show me around I geuss, right leader." he said trying to hide 
his want to get out of here.
